item.title: CWD Ltd Falls 11.06%: 2 Key Factors Driving the Weekly Volatility
item.description: CWD Ltd’s stock experienced a volatile week from 5 to 9 January 2026, ending with a notable 11.06% decline to close at Rs.369.10, significantly underperforming the Sensex which fell 2.62% over the same period. The week began with a fresh 52-week high of Rs.425, but was followed by sharp price corrections amid mixed technical signals and increased selling pressure, reflecting a complex market environment for the stock. Time: 49 minutes ago
